details:
adjective
- full of love and generosity
= example: full of love and generosity
- showing or motivated by sympathy and understanding and generosity
= example: showing or motivated by sympathy and understanding and generosity
= synonyms: benevolent, openhearted, sympathetic, good-hearted, large-hearted, kindly
- relating to or characterized by charity
= example: relating to or characterized by charity
